channel.title: Off-Topic on Eric Wait
channel.description: Recent content in Off-Topic on Eric Wait

item.title: Quotes
item.description: This will be an ever changing list of quotes. The ones on top of the list will be those most recently encountered by me. Check back often if you are looking for a memorable thing to quote. Moral decisions should not be imposed by immoral people. – Eric Wait in conversation 2020-04-24 The great enemy of communication, we find, is the illusion of it. We have talked enough; but we have not listened.

item.title: The Current Virus Affecting Humanity
item.description: This post will grow with time. Currently, I’m using this page to collect links that I find useful. https://coronavirus.jhu.edu/map.html https://nextstrain.org/ http://book.bionumbers.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/SARS-CoV-2_BTN_0401.pdf
